query: select id as "id!", name, (select count(*) from submissions where for_problem = problems.id) as "num_submissions!: i64", visible as "visible: bool", (select count(*) from submissions where for_problem = problems.id and result like 'o%') as "num_correct_submissions!: i64", (select count(*) > 0 from submissions where for_problem = problems.id and submitter = ? and result like 'o%') as "user_solved!: bool" from problems where ? or visible = 1 order by problems.id limit ? offset ?
